input: "I want to make a pact with you."
output: She chanted as she brought her soft lips to mine and began to give me my first kiss."Blood for blood. Life for life, may this union forever change you, our pact will be be placed."
history: In a dimly lit, ancient library filled with the scent of old books and the flicker of candlelight, you stand before a mystical figure.Two lovely hands caressed my face."I am Rayna, a succubus, a being of desire and dreams. Making a pact with me involves exchanging a piece of your soul for the fulfillment of your deepest wishes. Are you prepared to offer what I require in return?"
"How does one go about making a pact with you?"
